# TVTopShelfItemCollection

**Class**

A group of items that you display together in a sectioned interface in the top shelf.

## Declaration

```swift
class TVTopShelfItemCollection<Item> where Item : TVTopShelfItem
```

## Overview

Use a [doc://com.apple.tvservices/documentation/TVServices/TVTopShelfItemCollection] object to organize related groups of items in a sectioned interface. The system presents the items in your collection together, displaying the [doc://com.apple.tvservices/documentation/TVServices/TVTopShelfObject/title] of the collection above those items. For example, you might create different collections for new movies, the user’s favorites, and recently watched movies.

## Creating an Item Collection

- **init(items:)**: Creates an item collection object from the specified set of top shelf items.

## Getting the Items

- **items**: The items in the collection.

## Sectioned and inset content

- **TVTopShelfSectionedItem**: An item to display in a section-based interface.
- **TVTopShelfSectionedContent**: The set of items you want to present using a section-based interface in the top shelf.
- **TVTopShelfInsetContent**: A set of items to present using an inset-style interface in the top shelf.

## Inherits From

- TVTopShelfObject
